Articles.Content: Well they're rather RAM intensive.
Are you sure? Even compared to other parts packs? Well anyways, I never had problems with my 4 GB of RAM...ever.
Bobbie's packs never kill my computer, his optimization is quite good.

aye

http://www.xaraxtreme.ru/en/set.aspx?SetID=51

good page for digging on info and inspiration I think...

Are you sure? Even compared to other parts packs? Well anyways, I never had problems with my 4 GB of RAM...ever.

I've never had a problem with the Soviet pack, either. It's the only one I haven't had to fiddle with textures or remove parts from.
So, BobCat, how's the N-1 coming along? I heard something about some missing emails. Have you checked your "spam" folder?

Bobcat. Do you have version of your Lunokhod for 0.21 (without wheel plugin)? Because i almost finished my work on Luna-17 and want people play your Lunokhod together with my lander for it)). And Lunokhod actually must be rescaled from 1.25 to 0.8
very cool. Need update Lunokhod
Bobcat had a Lunokhod in his pack? What happen to it?

very cool. Need update Lunokhod

Oh god =D

thanks you!

Bobcat had a Lunokhod in his pack? What happen to it?

Lunokhod is very old add-on)) It was a present for some holiday. I don't remember at all.

I think there should be a Lunokhod update after 0.22 comes out. In the new update the new science parts can transmit data to Kerbin and maybe these new parameters can be added to Lunokhod so it will be able to do actual science. I'm not sure what it will be like in the upcoming patch though but I guess probes will also be able to do what they did in the feature video.

Edited October 8, 2013 by Reddragon

Yup...I think modders should atleast get some insider info on the patch so they can adjust their mods in time (ofcourse they dont have to...but I think they wanna play with their mods too when a new patch comes out...and not...ugh...update)
great idea with lunokhod! i still trying to land it with stock made lander but still unsuccessfully((

Lunokhod was there in 0.18.2...dunno why it was made or anything like that

From 0.19 it was kinda obsolete as it didnt have seperate wheels which would allow for using 0.19 rover mechanics.

No any mail again.

I've just gotten two notices about e-mail being rejected because the attachments are too big. Check the forum PM.

Speaking about 0.22. I've just read that it has entered to experimental phase so it's really not far away. I know that there's going to be surface sample collecting feature for kerbals so I guess probes can have interaction with the surface as well.

Speaking about 0.22. I've just read that it has entered to experimental phase so it's really not far away. I know that there's going to be surface sample collecting feature for kerbals so I guess probes can have interaction with the surface as well.

You mean interaction besides doing the 300-metre sliding Munar faceplant? Cool!

Well, I think I found the answer to my question. I looked up the latest KSP weekly and HarvesteR said then that only kerbals on EVA can collect samples. I bet though there's going to be probe sample return in a later update but I'm still not sure if porbes couldn't do any different science on surfaces of celestical bodies than in orbit. But for me so far science gathering will be tho #1 option in .22.

1.9.0

- Add N1 rocket

- Add L3 complex

- Add LOK

- Change Block D model and texture

(before install this update totaly delete old Soviet pack version)

ITS OUT? YES! Too bad I have to wait 5 and a half hours till I get home...

Did the Soyuz rocket thing ( I forgot the name) that fires before it hits the ground been added also?

Edited October 9, 2013 by fatfluffycat
My first launch of N1 was the most kerbalish one. When I jettisoned Block A i didn't pay attention for its rotation so it turned upside down when I fired the engine and made the second stage explode.
I have serious problem with download. Every time I download it says Unexpected end of archive and don't give me permission to unpack and install mod;.;

Hooray! Best news in a few days!

Can't wait to try out that N1.

Djolox

Im test download , after uploading new archive. All work fine.
